content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error when attempting to run "generate_map.py" in the "brno_reservoir_trip" folder. I then tried to execute the command to open alltrails.com, but it returned an error. I used the "google" command to search for hiking trails in the Czech Republic, which returned several websites, including alltrails.com. The website lists several hiking trails in the South Moravian region of the Czech Republic, ranging from easy to moderate difficulty, and encourages users to sign up for AllTrails+ for additional features. The app also promotes environmental conservation efforts. Following the error, I executed the command to install the AllTrails app using "sudo snap install alltrails".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Czech Republic?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on hiking trails in various countries, including the Czech Republic. The text lists several hiking trails in the South Moravian region of the Czech Republic, ranging from easy to moderate difficulty, and encourages users to sign up for AllTrails+ for additional features such as offline maps and wrong-turn alerts. The app also promotes environmental conservation efforts, including donating a portion of membership fees to One Tree Planted and partnering with Leave No Trace.\n\nLinks: ['AllTrails (https://www.alltrails.com/?ref=header)', 'Explore (https://www.alltrails.com/explore?ref=header)', 'Community (https://www.alltrails.com/community?ref=header)', 'Saved (https://www.alltrails.com/members/slug/favorites?ref=header)', 'Shop (https://www.alltrails.com/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo snap install alltrails"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.alltrails.com/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "hiking trails in the Czech Republic"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic", "https://www.wiredforadventure.com/stunning-hiking-destinations-in-the-czech-republic/", "https://traveltriangle.com/blog/trekking-in-czech-republic/", "https://www.roughguides.com/articles/experience-hiking-outdoor-and-history-czechia/", "https://www.we12travel.com/luznice-valley-hiking-trail-the-best-hike-in-czech-republic/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Czech_Hiking_Markers_System", "https://pickvisa.com/blog/the-best-hiking-trails-in-the-czech-republic", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g274684-Activities-c61-t87-Czech_Republic.html"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic", "question": "What are the best hiking trails in the Czech Republic?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result')]
"""
